author: lowette
body:
* commit of all latest rechit validation code; this should be able to produce out of the box the phase2 rechit plots for the TDR.
* small update to cluster validation code to update to latest geom/gt and hardcoded instead of automatic axis ranges to make the cluster residuals actually visible in the plots.
title: Update of cluster and rechit validation codes to be inline with TDR SotA.
